description:
Chiharu`s friend. She first met Chiharu when Chiharu praised one of her doujinshis. Later, she is helped by Hayate (in Hermione`s form) and it is revealed that she is a singer (in chapter 297), later on she is found out to be a full blown idol.
The first pages of chapter 268 describe that Nagi is pissed off Luca for some reasons. But she only makes her formal appearance in chapter 280, when Chiharu tells Hayate a few things of her life resembles his.
name: Suirenji Ruka
